scripts.plato-client: mkdir -p build/client/analysis && plato -r -d build/client/analysis -l .jshintrc -t 'Client Code Complexity' client/scripts
scripts.plato-server: mkdir -p build/server/analysis && plato -r -d build/server/analysis -l .jshintrc -t 'Server Code Complexity' server;
scripts.cr-client: mkdir -p build/client/analysis && cr -n -M 60 -f json -o build/client/analysis/cr.json client/scripts/*
scripts.cr-server: mkdir -p build/server/analysis && cr -n -M 60 -f json -o build/server/analysis/cr.json server/*
scripts.jshint: npm run jshint-client && npm run jshint-server
